battleTactics.name: Cut Off the Head
battleTactics.description: Claim the head of the enemy's general to shatter their morale.
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if the enemy general was slain this turn OR the enemy general was slain in an earlier turn and any enemy units were destroyed this turn.

command.name: Counter-Charge
command.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability
command.effect: That unit can use a CHARGE ability as if it were your charge phase

battleTactics.name: Raid
battleTactics.description: Drive deep into enemy territory and wreak havoc!
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if any friendly units are wholly within enemy territory and not in combat.

command.name: Steel Defence
command.timing: Reaction - Opponent declared an ATTACK ability
command.declare: A friendly unit targeted by that ATTACK ability
command.effect: Ignore the Rend characteristic of attacks that target that unit this phase

battleTactics.name: The Ignax Dais
battleTactics.description: Take the dais of Ignax so that we are filled with her fury and wrath.
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic if you control the Ignax (winged dragon) objective at the end of your turn.

command.name: Forward to Victory
command.timing: Reaction - You declared a CHARGE ability
command.declare: Used By: The unit using that CHARGE ability
command.effect: You can re-roll the charge roll

battleTactics.name: The Dracothion Dais
battleTactics.description: Noble Dracothion is marked upon this hallowed ground.
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic if you control the Dracothion (horned head) objective at the end of your turn.

command.name: Go to Ground
command.timing: Reaction - Opponent declared a SHOOT ability
command.declare: A friendly unit targeted by that SHOOT ability
command.effect: Until the end of the phase, only unmodified hit rolls of 6 successfully hit for attacks that target that unit. However, that unit has STRIKE-LAST this turn

effects.description: Only unmodified hit rolls of 6 successfully hit

battleTactics.name: Do Not Waver
battleTactics.description: We must not falter on any front. Stand fast, and keep the enemy at bay.
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if any friendly units used a FIGHT ability this turn AND no friendly units were destroyed this turn.

command.name: Fall Back and Rally
command.timing: Reaction - You declared a RETREAT ability
command.declare: The unit using that RETREAT ability
command.effect: No mortal damage is inflicted on that unit by the RETREAT ability. In addition, after the ability is resolved, roll 1 dice for each slain model from that unit. For each 5+, you can return 1 slain model to that unit

effects.description: No mortal damage from RETREAT ability
Roll dice for slain models, return on 5+

battleTactics.name: Attack on Two Fronts
battleTactics.description: Divide and conquer by approaching the foe from two directions.
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if you control 2 objectives that were controlled by your opponent at the start of the turn.

command.name: Call Reinforcements
command.declare: Pick a friendly INFANTRY or CAVALRY unit with 5 or more models that has been destroyed and has not already been replaced
command.effect: Set up a replacement unit consisting of D3 models from that unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 6" from all enemy units

battleTactics.name: The Behemat Dais
battleTactics.description: Claim the sigil of Behemat so that we might be blessed with his strength.
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic if you control the Behemat (skull) objective at the end of your turn.

command.name: Scroll of Arcane Bolt
command.declare: Pick a friendly HERO to use this ability, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them, then roll a dice
command.effect: On a 2+, inflict D3 mortal damage on that enemy unit

effects.description: Inflict D3 mortal damage on enemy unit within 12"

battleTactics.name: Take the Flanks
battleTactics.description: Surround the enemy before you close in for the kill.
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if there are any friendly units within 3" of each short battlefield edge.

command.name: Redeploy
command.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability
command.effect: That unit can move up to D6". That unit cannot move into combat during any part of that move. This movement counts as a run ability

battleTactics.name: Raze
battleTactics.description: Break through enemy lines and lay waste to the lands beyond.
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if there are any friendly units within 3" of the long battlefield edge in enemy territory.

command.name: Inspiring Presence
command.declare: Pick a friendly HERO to use this ability
command.effect: Roll a dice. For the rest of the turn, add the number rolled to the control score of that HERO

battleTactics.name: War of Attrition
battleTactics.description: Grind down the enemy to shatter their resolve.
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if any enemy units were destroyed this turn AND more enemy units than friendly units were destroyed this turn.

command.name: Stand Guard
command.declare: Pick a friendly unit to use this ability
command.effect: That unit has STRIKE-FIRST this turn

battleTactics.name: Hold Ground
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if there are more friendly models contesting the large terrain feature in your territory than there are enemy models contesting it.

command.name: Rise to the Challenge
command.declare: Pick a friendly HERO to use this ability

battleTactics.name: Take Without Warning
battleTactics.description: The enemy leaves a critical position unguarded. Claim it!
battleTactics.requirement: You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if you gain control of an objective that was controlled by your opponent at the start of the turn AND none of the units contesting that objective used a FIGHT ability this turn.

command.name: Fight to the Last
command.timing: Reaction - Opponent declared an ATTACK ability
command.declare: A friendly unit targeted by that ATTACK ability
command.effect: That unit has WARD (5+) this phase
